thread.title: Darlene

author: Darlene
title: Darlene
text:
I love how easily it comes onto my screen!
I wish it remembered only the 4 calendars I have checked and unchecked please versus me always unchecking the 4 I do not need.
Also, I wish the top 3 bars were thinner, so I could get more on my screen please.
Finally, I wish the down arrow would just move the current month, not move to the next month. The right arrow should move to the next month, not the down arrow. (I am not a mouser.)
I hope this helps!!! :)
